antifeatures.DisabledAlgorithm: This app has a weak security signature
antifeatures.KnownVuln: This app contains a known security vulnerability
antifeatures.NoSourceSince: The source code is no longer available, no updates possible
antifeatures.NonFreeDep: This app depends on other non-free apps
antifeatures.NonFreeNet: This app promotes non-free network services
antifeatures.Tracking: This app tracks and reports your activity
antifeatures.UpstreamNonFree: The upstream source code is not entirely Free

index.introduction: F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) applications for the Android platform. The client makes it easy to browse, install, and keep track of updates on your device.
index.title: What is F-Droid?

package.anti_features_warning: This app has features you may not like.
package.author: Author
package.minimum_android_version: This version requires Android [android_version] or newer.
package.signed_by_developer: It is built and signed by the original developer.
package.signed_by_fdroid: It is built and signed by F-Droid, and guaranteed to correspond to this source tarball.
package.suggest_downloading_via_fdroid: Although APK downloads are available below to give you the choice, you should be aware that by installing that way you will not receive update notifications and it's a less secure way to download. We recommend that you install the F-Droid client and use that.
